programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick and Craig Robinson

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans

programme.title: President Under Siege
programme.desc: Premiere. The Belgian prime minister is kidnapped and told that he must assassinate the US president if he ever wants to see his family again. Thriller, starring Adam Godley, Saskia Reeves and Koen De Bouw. In Dutch and English

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the near future, Wolverine cares for an ailing Professor X somewhere on the Mexican border. Fantasy adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen and Stephen Merchant(n)

programme.title: Logan

However, the razor-clawed hero's attempts to hide from the world are turned upside down when a young mutant arrives, pursued by lethal forces. Fantasy adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen and Stephen Merchant(n)

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Premiere. Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious island, a top-secret mission to the same region descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson(n)

programme.title: White Christmas
programme.desc: A pair of former soldiers start a new career as nightclub entertainers. They try to boost the popularity of their old commanding officer's struggling winter resort in Vermont by staging a series of extravagant shows, with a little help from their former army buddies and a talented singing sister act. Musical, starring Bing Crosby, Danny Kaye, Vera-Ellen, Dean Jagger, Sig Rumann, Mary Wickes, Anne Whitfield and Rosemary Clooney, featuring seasonal songs by Irving Berlin

programme.title: Winter Wedding
programme.desc: A woman travels to small-town Vermont hoping to spend the perfect Christmas with her long-lost family, but an anonymous text threatens to derail everything. Romantic drama, starring Erin Krakow, Niall Matter and Wendie Malick

programme.title: Flirting With Love
programme.desc: Constant distractions hamper a pair of struggling New York actors who retreat to the country to work on a script. Comedy, starring Marisa Tomei, Sam Rockwell and Ivan Martin

programme.title: Shadowlands
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the later life of novelist CS Lewis, detailing how he fell in love with American poet Joy Gresham, only to see his new-found happiness marred by tragedy and illness. Directed by Richard Attenborough and starring Anthony Hopkins, Debra Winger, Edward Hardwicke, John Wood, Michael Denison and Joseph Mazzello

programme.title: Cleopatra
programme.desc: The famous Queen sets out to consolidate her power after gaining control of the Egyptian kingdom. She seduces Julius Caesar and bears him a son, but the ambitious would-be tyrant is assassinated before she can take her place at his side, paving the way for her love affair with general Mark Antony - and a war for control of the Roman empire. Historical epic, starring Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, Martin Landau, Rex Harrison, Hume Cronyn and George Cole

programme.title: Fences
programme.desc: Adaptation of the August Wilson play about a working-class African-American dad trying to raise his family in the 1950s, while coming to terms with the events of his life. Directed by and starring Denzel Washington, with an Oscar-winning Viola Davis

programme.title: Say Anything
programme.desc: An aspiring teenage kickboxer falls for the most beautiful and intelligent girl in his class, and to his delight she feels the same way about him - but her father is not so enthusiastic about the relationship. Romantic comedy drama, starring John Cusack, Ione Skye and John Mahoney, and featuring a cameo from Cusack's real-life sister Joan. Written and directed by Cameron Crowe

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: The story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, and his friendship with his mentor at Trinity College, Cambridge, Professor GH Hardy. Biographical drama, starring Jeremy Irons, Dev Patel and Malcolm Sinclair

programme.title: Fences
programme.desc: Adaptation of the August Wilson play about a working-class African-American dad trying to raise his family in the 1950s, while coming to terms with the events of his life. Directed by and starring Denzel Washington, with an Oscar-winning Viola Davis

programme.title: Say Anything
programme.desc: An aspiring teenage kickboxer falls for the most beautiful and intelligent girl in his class, and to his delight she feels the same way about him - but her father is not so enthusiastic about the relationship. Romantic comedy drama, starring John Cusack, Ione Skye and John Mahoney, and featuring a cameo from Cusack's real-life sister Joan. Written and directed by Cameron Crowe

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: A Navy recruit undergoing officer training has an uneasy romance with a factory worker. He also attracts the attention of a tough, uncompromising sergeant, who sees his potential and is determined to push him to the limit. Romantic drama, starring Richard Gere, Debra Winger, Louis Gossett Jr, Robert Loggia, David Keith and David Caruso

programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: British broadcaster and journalist David Frost comes up with the idea of setting up a series of exclusive televised interviews with the disgraced former president of the United States, Richard Nixon. Believing he could use the publicity as a chance to resurrect his political career and make some easy money, Nixon agrees but soon realises he has underestimated Frost. Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: A chauffeur's daughter falls for her father's playboy employer, but when he rejects her she flees to Paris. On her return, however, he is smitten by the alluring woman she has become - even though he is about to be married. To ensure the wedding takes place, his older brother decides to woo the beauty himself. Comedy, starring Audrey Hepburn, William Holden, Humphrey Bogart and Walter Hampden

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: A woman supports her daughter despite their differences over three tumultuous decades. The indomitable matriarch disapproves of her daughter's marriage and finds grandmotherhood hard to get used to, but is fiercely protective of her family when tragedy strikes. Oscar-winning drama, starring Shirley MacLaine, Debra Winger, Jack Nicholson, Danny DeVito and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: The head of a Yorkshire family takes in a mysterious boy, who is treated cruelly by the rest of the household but develops a close bond with his foster sister. Over the years to come as they both grow up, their relationship grows more intense, with devastating repercussions for all concerned. Period drama, based on Emily Bronte's novel, starring Ralph Fiennes and Juliette Binoche

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: A hard-working construction worker is forced to deal with life-shattering loss when his family are killed in a plane crash. Drama, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Scoot McNairy and Maggie Grace

programme.title: Anything For Love
programme.desc: An executive lies about her career on her dating profile, while her suitor also hides his true identity. Romantic comedy, starring Erika Christensen and Paul Greene

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro

programme.title: Taps
programme.desc: When a military academy is threatened with demolition, the fiercely loyal cadets break out the contents of the armoury and fight to defend the institution from the invading developers - ultimately leading to a confrontation with the real army. Drama, starring George C Scott, Timothy Hutton, Sean Penn and Tom Cruise

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A reclusive genius creates a boy but dies before completing him, leaving his brainchild with scissor-like blades in place of hands. A kindly woman from a nearby suburb takes pity on the lonely figure and welcomes him into her home. He quickly becomes a hit in the neighbourhood - but then his new friends start to turn against him. Tim Burton's fantasy, starring Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest and Vincent Price

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro

programme.title: Runaway Bride
programme.desc: A disreputable journalist hopes to get his ailing career back on track by writing an article about a commitment-shy woman famed for ditching bridegrooms at the altar - but complications arise when the pair meet on the eve of her latest attempt at marriage. Romantic comedy, starring Julia Roberts and Richard Gere, with Joan Cusack, Hector Elizondo and Rita Wilson

programme.title: A Mighty Heart
programme.desc: Drama based on journalist Mariane Pearl's account of her husband Daniel's kidnapping and murder by a militant group. Mariane was pregnant when she travelled with him to Pakistan. When he disappeared without trace, the frantic search for him turned into a media frenzy. Starring Angelina Jolie, Dan Futterman and Archie Panjabi(n)

programme.title: Great Expectations
programme.desc: A penniless boy falls for the niece of an elderly recluse. He grows up to be an artist and is unexpectedly elevated to New York high society by a mysterious benefactor. He seeks out his lost love, unaware of the disturbing secrets he will uncover. Drama transferring the Dickens novel to a modern setting, starring Ethan Hawke, Gwyneth Paltrow, Anne Bancroft and Robert De Niro(n)

programme.title: The Bible
programme.desc: John Huston's epic re-telling of the Book of Genesis, chronicling the stories of Adam and Eve, Noah and the flood and Abraham and Isaac. Starring Richard Harris, Peter O'Toole, Michael Parks, Ava Gardner, George C Scott and Huston himself as the voice of God(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Showman: Special
programme.desc: A special look at the show-stopping PT Barnum biopic, starring Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron and Michelle Williams(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: Biopic of influential country singer Hank Williams, exploring his tempestuous marriage and addiction to alcohol and painkillers. With Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen(n)

programme.title: Bravetown
programme.desc: After a run-in with the law, aspiring DJ Josh Harvest is shipped off to the small town that's home to his estranged dad, and attempts to make amends with his family and past friends. Drama, starring Josh Duhamel, Lucas Till, Maria Bello and Laura Dern(n)

programme.title: The Finest Hours
programme.desc: An oil tanker suffers devastating damage while caught in a fierce Atlantic storm, which breaks the vessel in two. While an engineer tries to keep the crew members trapped in the sinking wreckage alive, members of the Coast Guard brave the deadly conditions to come to their rescue. Fact-based disaster movie, starring Chris Pine, Casey Affleck and Eric Bana(n)

programme.title: The Evening Star
programme.desc: An eccentric woman feels unable to stand by and watch her three adult grandchildren mess up their lives, but ends up becoming hopelessly entangled in their affairs - while failing to realise she has her own problems to face. Drama sequel to Terms of Endearment, starring Shirley MacLaine, Bill Paxton, Juliette Lewis and Miranda Richardson(n)

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: A professional relationship guru, who specialises in offering advice to lonely single men, helps an unlucky-in-love accountant to woo the girl of his dreams. However, when he finds himself falling for a beautiful gossip columnist, his usual charm abandons him and he discovers his expertise counts for nothing. Romantic comedy, with Will Smith, Eva Mendes, Kevin James, Amber Valletta, Julie Ann Emery, Adam Arkin and Michael Rapaport(n)

programme.title: All the Right Moves
programme.desc: A hot-headed high-school football player is eager to escape his depression-hit Pennsylvania steeltown by winning a sporting scholarship to college - a dream jeopardised by friction with an equally ambitious coach. Sporting drama, starring Tom Cruise, Craig T Nelson, Lea Thompson and Charles Cioffi(n)

programme.title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet
programme.desc: A city is divided by the conflict between two feuding families - the fathers are bitter business rivals, and the younger generation are continually fighting in the streets. The son of one household falls in love at first sight with his enemy's daughter - but the vendetta threatens their secret romance. Baz Luhrmann's modern update of Shakespeare's tragic love story, with Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Pete Postlethwaite and Miriam Margolyes(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: A woman who has rarely been without a boyfriend moves to New York following a break-up with her boyfriend. She makes a fun-loving new friend, who introduces her to the city's nightlife and teaches her to enjoy the advantages of being single. Comedy, starring Dakota Johnson, Rebel Wilson, Alison Brie and Leslie Mann(n)

programme.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
programme.desc: A Kazakhstani journalist is sent to the United States to learn about the country and its customs. However, when the inquisitive reporter stumbles across an episode of Baywatch featuring Pamela Anderson, he becomes convinced she is his future bride and embarks on a reckless mission to track her down. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Ken Davitian and Pamela Anderson

programme.title: Revenge of the Nerds
programme.desc: Two social outcasts set up their own college fraternity for similarly un-hip students to give the campus sporting jocks a run for their money. Comedy, starring Anthony Edwards, Robert Carradine, Ted McGinley and Timothy Busfield

programme.title: Police Academy 6: City Under Siege
programme.desc: The clueless cops return yet again, this time to thwart the machinations of a crime lord behind a wave of raids and robberies in the city. Unfortunately, they are unaware Mr Big is always one step ahead thanks to a police informer. Penultimate entry in the comedy series, starring Bubba Smith, David Graf, Michael Winslow, Matt McCoy and Leslie Easterbrook

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3 Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the latest comedy in the series

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: A washed-up and embittered baseball player struggles with bad memories of a failed sports career. When his exasperated lawyer suggests he coach a losing Little-League team, he begins to turn himself and the youngsters into a force to be reckoned with. Richard Linklater's remake of the 1970s comedy, starring Billy Bob Thornton, Greg Kinnear, Marcia Gay Harden and Emmanuel Estrada

programme.title: The Tiger Hunter
programme.desc: A young Indian man moves to 1970s Chicago in the hope of impressing his childhood crush and living up to the legacy of his father, but not everything goes to plan. Comedy, starring Danny Pudi, Rizwan Manji and Jon Heder

programme.title: The Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: Inept police detective Frank Drebin plans to retire from the force, but is lured back by the opportunity to foil a terrorist plot. Going undercover in prison, he sets out to prevent an evil mastermind from escaping and carrying out his fiendish plan - to bomb the Oscar awards ceremony. Comedy sequel, starring Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley, OJ Simpson, George Kennedy and Fred Ward

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Ambitious journalist Alison's one-night stand with directionless layabout Ben has unexpected consequences when she discovers she is pregnant. However, the unlikely parents decide to give the relationship a try for their baby's sake, forcing Ben to face the challenge of accepting responsibility for the first time in his life. Romantic comedy, starring Seth Rogen, Katherine Heigl and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Conjoined twins head for the bright lights of Hollywood, where one of them lands a role on a TV show starring alongside Cher - but his dreams of acting success are hampered by his brother's determination to search for the woman he has been romancing online. Comedy from the Farrelly brothers, starring Matt Damon and Greg Kinnear, and featuring cameo appearances by Meryl Streep and Jack Nicholson as themselves

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: When he hears life after the supermarket isn't much fun for groceries, Frank the sausage investigates. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Singleton Jane is literally always the bridesmaid and never the bride, a role she assumes for the 28th time when her sister announces she is getting married - to a man Jane is secretly in love with. As she wrestles with her feelings, Jane's predicament attracts the attention of a reporter fascinated by her story. Romantic comedy, starring Katherine Heigl, James Marsden and Malin Akerman

programme.title: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Conjoined twins head for the bright lights of Hollywood, where one of them lands a role on a TV show starring alongside Cher - but his dreams of acting success are hampered by his brother's determination to search for the woman he has been romancing online. Comedy from the Farrelly brothers, starring Matt Damon and Greg Kinnear, and featuring cameo appearances by Meryl Streep and Jack Nicholson as themselves

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Ambitious journalist Alison's one-night stand with directionless layabout Ben has unexpected consequences when she discovers she is pregnant. However, the unlikely parents decide to give the relationship a try for their baby's sake, forcing Ben to face the challenge of accepting responsibility for the first time in his life. Romantic comedy, starring Seth Rogen, Katherine Heigl and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: When he hears life after the supermarket isn't much fun for groceries, Frank the sausage investigates. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Bruno
programme.desc: A gay Austrian fashion journalist becomes a figure of hate in his own country, and heads to America in search of celebrity with his adoring assistant in tow. He embarks on a campaign of publicity stunts to make himself famous, encountering prejudice and meeting people similarly desperate for stardom. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen and Gustaf Hammarsten

programme.title: Ali G Indahouse
programme.desc: Scheming politicians try to manipulate the unwitting Ali G into bringing about the downfall of the prime minister - but fail to appreciate that his streetwise attitude could give the government much-needed street cred. Comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Michael Gambon, Charles Dance, Kellie Bright, Martin Freeman and Rhona Mitra

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: A family purchases a robot servant to perform menial tasks but quickly realises this is no ordinary droid when he begins to develop human emotions and the capacity to think for himself, a quality encouraged by his owner's children. He asks for his freedom, and spends the next 200 years struggling to come to terms with its humanity. Chris Columbus's sci-fi drama inspired by the books of Isaac Asimov, starring Robin Williams, Sam Neill, Embeth Davidtz and Oliver Platt

programme.title: Airheads
programme.desc: Frustrated heavy metal band the Lone Rangers are determined to get air time for their new record and take a radio station hostage to ensure it happens. Comedy, starring Steve Buscemi, Brendan Fraser, Adam Sandler and Michael McKean

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmate's five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: The officious captain of a seaside town's home guard platoon tries to maintain the reputation and morale of his troops as the Second World War draws to a close. He finds himself dealing with the hunt for a German spy as well as a female journalist sent to report on the exploits of the brave but bumbling soldiers. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Toby Jones, Bill Nighy and Catherine Zeta-Jones

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: A washed-up pop idol is given the chance to write a song for a teenage star - but despite his musical talents, he has never written a lyric in his life. However, the discovery that the woman who looks after his plants has a way with words marks the start of a beautiful relationship. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Drew Barrymore, Brad Garret and Kristen Johnston

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: A man suffering a midlife crisis tries to recapture his lost youth by going back to his old haunts with two equally unhappy friends and his teenage nephew. They end up being transported back to 1986 and are tempted to give themselves the lives they always wanted - despite warnings that they must not change anything. Sci-fi comedy, starring John Cusack, Clark Duke, Craig Robinson and Rob Corddry

programme.title: Three Amigos
programme.desc: Three silent Western movie stars are summoned to Mexico for what they think will be a public appearance - only to discover the locals really believe in their heroic abilities and expect them to rid their town of a group of evil bandits. Comedy, starring Steve Martin, Chevy Chase and Martin Short

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: A man suffering a midlife crisis tries to recapture his lost youth by going back to his old haunts with two equally unhappy friends and his teenage nephew. They end up being transported back to 1986 and are tempted to give themselves the lives they always wanted - despite warnings that they must not change anything. Sci-fi comedy, starring John Cusack, Clark Duke, Craig Robinson and Rob Corddry

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: A lowly fish-tank cleaner working at a gigolo's luxurious house has his eyes opened to a completely new way of life - but an accident with his employer's prized pets puts him into a tricky situation. Desperate to raise a quick buck, he is soon entertaining a series of increasingly sex-crazed women. Comedy, starring Rob Schneider, William Forsythe, Eddie Griffin, Oded Fehr and Gail O'Grady(n)

programme.title: Balls of Fury
programme.desc: A table tennis champion's life falls apart after defeat at the Olympics. However, he gets the chance to redeem himself and get revenge when the FBI recruits him to infiltrate a secret underground ping-pong tournament run by an elusive criminal genius. Comedy sending up kung fu movies, starring Dan Fogler, Christopher Walken and Maggie Q(n)

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: A lowly insurance clerk tries to curry favour with his seedy manager by lending him his flat for his extramarital flings. But the clerk soon grows wise to the nastiness of corporate ethics and infidelity when his heartless boss seduces the elevator girl, whom he has always loved from afar. Oscar-winning comedy drama, directed by Billy Wilder and starring Jack Lemmon, Fred MacMurray and Shirley MacLaine(n)

Southern California is plunged into panic following the attack on Pearl Harbor. A group of American soldiers and a renegade air force pilot are caught up in the mayhem, unaware that a lost Japanese submarine crew are actually planning an attack - if they can find their way to Hollywood. Steven Spielberg's comedy, starring Dan Aykroyd, John Belushi and Christopher Lee(n)

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: A feminist FBI agent is sent undercover as a contestant in the Miss United States pageant when the event becomes the target of a terrorist bomb threat. As she is not exactly catwalk material, a veteran British coach is brought on board to oversee her transformation into a glamorous beauty queen. Comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen and William Shatner(n)

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureau's publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns(n)

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: A couple seek the aid of a former rival in fighting back against the raucous college sorority that moves in next door to them. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick(n)

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: A lonely New Yorker is rescued from drowning by a mermaid, who falls in love with him and assumes human form so she can seek him out in Manhattan. He is soon equally smitten, and she resolves to keep her true nature a secret from him. However, an obsessive scientist suspects the truth and plans to prove it. Romantic fantasy comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Daryl Hannah and John Candy(n)

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory-loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd(n)

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: A couple seek the aid of a former rival in fighting back against the raucous college sorority that moves in next door to them. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick(n)

programme.title: Paul
programme.desc: An alien held captive in a top-secret American military base escapes and hides out in the van of two English comic-book geeks on a tour of UFO hotspots. The wisecracking extraterrestrial enlists the duo's help in getting back to his spaceship, but they are soon pursued by government agents and unwittingly become kidnappers. Sci-fi comedy, starring Simon Pegg and Nick Frost, with the voice of Seth Rogen(n)

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: A former CIA agent raises his daughter alone in the wilderness of Finland, teaching her to be the world's deadliest assassin. When she turns 16, she is sent to carry out her one intended mission, but as she travels the world in search of her target, she is pursued by a CIA operative with a link to her mysterious past. Action thriller, with Saoirse Ronan, Cate Blanchett and Eric Bana

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Philadelphia brawler Rocky Balboa gets a shot at the world heavyweight title when current champion Apollo Creed decides to give an unknown boxer a chance in celebration of America's bicentennial. Oscar-winning drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young and Carl Weathers

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: Three highly skilled fighter pilots are less than thrilled when a new computer with artificial intelligence is brought in to assist in flying a state-of-the-art jet. However, the trio are left to pick up the pieces when the machine is struck by lightning and begins to malfunction, leading to a chaotic battle to stop the jet from starting an all-out war. Action adventure, starring Jamie Foxx, Jessica Biel and Josh Lucas

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: The captain of a British warship engages in a tense battle of wits and an escalating test of nerves with a French counterpart during the Napoleonic conflict, a pursuit that takes his crew on a dangerous journey along the coast of South America. Seafaring drama, adapted from Patrick O'Brian's novels, starring Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, James D'Arcy, Billy Boyd and Edward Woodall

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor. Edited for language

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: An arrogant pilot's maverick flying skills earn him a place in an elite US Navy school, where he comes into conflict with a fellow student and falls for his civilian instructor. A tragedy in the air threatens to end his military career - until an international incident offers him a chance to redeem himself. Aerial action adventure, starring Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis, Val Kilmer, Anthony Edwards and Tom Skerritt

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Philadelphia boxer Rocky Balboa quits the ring to marry his sweetheart and become a father. However, times prove hard and money is tight, so when Balboa is offered another shot at Apollo Creed's heavyweight title, the fighter is lured out of retirement. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers, Burt Young and Burgess Meredith

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A Trojan prince elopes with the king of Sparta's wife, sparking a bitter and bloody war between a mighty alliance of Greek kings and the city of Troy, whose champion engages in intense personal conflict with the enemy's most formidable warrior. Wolfgang Petersen's adventure, inspired by Homer's epic poem The Iliad, with Brad Pitt, Eric Bana, Orlando Bloom, Brian Cox, Sean Bean and Peter O'Toole

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor. Edited for language

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: An arrogant pilot's maverick flying skills earn him a place in an elite US Navy school, where he comes into conflict with a fellow student and falls for his civilian instructor. A tragedy in the air threatens to end his military career - until an international incident offers him a chance to redeem himself. Aerial action adventure, starring Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis, Val Kilmer, Anthony Edwards and Tom Skerritt

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: Three highly skilled fighter pilots are less than thrilled when a new computer with artificial intelligence is brought in to assist in flying a state-of-the-art jet. However, the trio are left to pick up the pieces when the machine is struck by lightning and begins to malfunction, leading to a chaotic battle to stop the jet from starting an all-out war. Action adventure, starring Jamie Foxx, Jessica Biel and Josh Lucas

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A disillusioned man learns his father was a member of a secret society of superpowered assassins dedicated to eliminating people who are destined to commit acts of evil in the future. Having inherited his father's special abilities, he is recruited into the organisation and must take on a former member who has betrayed it. Action adventure, starring James McAvoy, Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Philadelphia boxer Rocky Balboa quits the ring to marry his sweetheart and become a father. However, times prove hard and money is tight, so when Balboa is offered another shot at Apollo Creed's heavyweight title, the fighter is lured out of retirement. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers, Burt Young and Burgess Meredith

programme.title: Asian Connection
programme.desc: Trouble brews when a pair of expat bank robbers unwittingly rip off a ruthless drug lord. Action thriller, starring John Edward Lee, Steven Seagal and Michael Jai White

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: A cop returns to duty after being injured in an incident that led to the death of his partner. On his first day back, he discovers evidence of corruption among his colleagues. He soon finds himself trapped inside his own precinct and fighting for survival against crooked cops determined to keep their misdeeds a secret. Action thriller sequel, starring Jonathan Good and Roger R Cross

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter Two
programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Four soldiers are sent on a top-secret mission in Iraq that results in them being imprisoned for a crime they did not commit. When they learn the culprit is trying to sell equipment for producing fake currency, they break out of prison to find both him and evidence of their innocence. Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: World heavyweight boxing champion Rocky Balboa settles down into a life of luxury - but a cloud appears on the horizon in the shape of ambitious contender Clubber Lang, whose brutal fighting style represents a serious threat to his title. Drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Mr T, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers and Hulk Hogan

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter Two
programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Four soldiers are sent on a top-secret mission in Iraq that results in them being imprisoned for a crime they did not commit. When they learn the culprit is trying to sell equipment for producing fake currency, they break out of prison to find both him and evidence of their innocence. Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson

programme.title: The 13th Warrior
programme.desc: A disgraced Arabic nobleman exiled from his Baghdad home joins forces with Norse warriors at the close of the first millennium, and ends up battling seemingly invincible fiends during an epic journey. Action adventure adapted from the novel Eaters of the Dead by Michael Crichton, starring Antonio Banderas, Diane Venora, Dennis Storhi, Vladimir Kulich and Omar Sharif(n)

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: A maverick Canadian Mountie poses as a convict to smash a sinister plot involving the sale of human organs, only to find himself facing a desperate fight for survival. Thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Robert Guillaume and Cynthia Gibb(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: World heavyweight boxing champion Rocky Balboa settles down into a life of luxury - but a cloud appears on the horizon in the shape of ambitious contender Clubber Lang, whose brutal fighting style represents a serious threat to his title. Drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Mr T, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers and Hulk Hogan(n)

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Wise karate mentor Mr Miyagi meets the orphaned teenage grand-daughter of a soldier who once saved his life. As well as guiding her through the trials of high school and her first romance, he takes her to a Zen monastery to hone her martial arts skills. Adventure sequel, starring Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside and Constance Towers(n)

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: An arrogant racing driver is determined to seize the reigning Nascar champion's crown, winning the Indianapolis 500 in the process. However, his first few races see him intimidated by the surroundings and unable to finish due to crashes or blown engines. A serious accident compounds his misfortunes and jeopardises his chances of ever racing again. Drama, starring Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Robert Duvall, Randy Quaid and John C Reilly(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. As survivors try to flee the seemingly unstoppable alien invaders, the courageous US president, an ace pilot and a computer genius come up with a plan to take the fight to the enemy and save the human race. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens' salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even dealier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: An archer fighting in Richard the Lionheart's crusading army returns home to England and assumes the identity of a nobleman killed in battle. His new-found status draws him into a dangerous conflict with members of the newly crowned King John's court, and a traitorous knight plots to aid the French in conquering England. Ridley Scott's medieval adventure, starring Russell Crowe, Cate Blanchett and Mark Strong(n)

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: The Italian Stallion agrees to help former champion Apollo Creed train for a match against a seemingly invincible boxer from the Soviet Union, only to see his friend die as a result of injuries sustained in the fight. Rocky vows to avenge him, and prepares to take on the Russian heavyweight in his own country. Drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Dolph Lundgren, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers and Brigitte Nielsen(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. As survivors try to flee the seemingly unstoppable alien invaders, the courageous US president, an ace pilot and a computer genius come up with a plan to take the fight to the enemy and save the human race. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens' salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even dealier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: An archer fighting in Richard the Lionheart's crusading army returns home to England and assumes the identity of a nobleman killed in battle. His new-found status draws him into a dangerous conflict with members of the newly crowned King John's court, and a traitorous knight plots to aid the French in conquering England. Ridley Scott's medieval adventure, starring Russell Crowe, Cate Blanchett and Mark Strong(n)

programme.title: Hugh Jackman: Movie Musical Greats
programme.desc: The Greatest Showman star joins Alex Zane to discuss his career on stage and screen, as well as his favourite movie musicals of all time

programme.title: Fun in Acapulco
programme.desc: A former trapeze artist tries to put a work-related tragedy behind him by taking a job as a lifeguard and entertainer in a luxury hotel at the Mexican resort. He ends up contending with the considerable wiles of his beautiful boss and a female matador who each have romantic designs on him. Musical comedy, starring Elvis Presley, Ursula Andress, Paul Lukas and Alejandro Rey

programme.title: Roustabout
programme.desc: A leather-clad drifter with a talent for all things tuneful joins a travelling carnival, and catches the eye of a co-worker - but her father is less less than keen on the relationship, leading to trouble. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Barbara Stanwyck, Joan Freeman, Leif Erickson and Sue Ann Langdon

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3 Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the latest comedy in the series

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart

programme.title: Living Is Easy with Eyes Closed
programme.desc: An English teacher in Spain picks up two hitchhikers on his quest to meet John Lennon. Comedy drama set in 1966, starring Javier Camara, Natalia de Molina and Francesc Colomer

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: An imaginative youngster with dreams of being an inventor grows up to be a downtrodden single mother, struggling to support her chaotic family. She sees a chance to turn all their lives around when inspiration strikes and she creates a new household tool, but faces the challenge of selling her product in the demanding world of a home shopping TV station. Fact-based drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: The Surprise
programme.desc: After signing an agreement with a company specialising in assisted suicides, a deeply depressed man suddenly falls in love. Romantic comedy, starring Jeroen van Koningsbrugge, Georgina Verbaan and Jan Decleir

programme.title: Our Man Flint
programme.desc: The world is rocked by a series of mysterious ecological disasters, while top secret agents from all nations are being murdered. Super-cool American spy Derek Flint is soon on the case, and discovers a fiendish organisation using a weather-controlling machine to hold the world to ransom. Comedy adventure, with James Coburn, Lee J Cobb and Gina Golan

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: A poor teenager leaves home and hits the road with a crew of magazine sellers. She gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love while crossing the Midwest Inuted States. Drama, starring Sasha Lane, Shia LaBeouf and Riley Keough

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving are targeted by the authorities in 1950s Virginia, leading to an historic legal battle. Fact-based drama, starring Ruth Negga, Joel Edgerton and Will Dalton

programme.title: The Darjeeling Limited
programme.desc: Three brothers drift apart after their father's death. A year later, the eldest arranges for the other two to join him on a soul-searching trip across India to rebuild their relationship and track down their estranged mother. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman and Anjelica Huston

programme.title: Tramontane
programme.desc: A blind Lebanese musician embarks on a journey of self-discovery when learns that his true heritage has been kept from him. Drama, starring Barakat Jabbour, Julia Kassar and Toufic Barakat. In Arabic

programme.title: The Goob
programme.desc: A teenager spends every summer helping out in his mother's cafe and working on the harvest in the nearby pumpkin fields. The latest harvest season proves a very different one, as tension brews with his mother's new boyfriend and a flirtatious relationship with a foreign worker in the fields makes him consider a different future. Drama, starring Liam Walpole and Marama Corlett

programme.title: Warsaw 44
programme.desc: A factory worker in Nazi occupied Poland joins a resistance movement. He finds himself torn between two very different women, but all three of them will be drawn into a growing conflict as the approach of the Soviet army inspires the rebels to launch a climactic battle against their oppressors. Second World War drama, starring Jozef Pawlowski and Zofia Wichlacz. In Polish and German

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: Three sisters who share a house together receive word that their estranged father has died. They travel to attend his funeral, only to discover he has a teenage daughter by another mother, who is now an orphan. They invite the girl to live with them, sparking a journey of self-discovery for all four women. Drama based on Akimi Yoshida's comic-book series, starring Haruka Ayase, Masami Nagasawa, Kaho and Suzu Hirose. In Japanese

programme.title: Men & Chicken
programme.desc: Two brothers discover they are adopted, and go in search of their biological father, a reclusive scientist. The search leads them to their three eccentric half-brothers, who live together on an island, and a shocking revelation about their father's research. Comedy, starring David Dencik and Mads Mikkelsen. In Danish

programme.title: Journey to the Shore
programme.desc: A wife's husband returns to her three years after he drowned at sea, and she agrees to let him take her on a journey. Drama, starring Eri Fukatsu and Tadanobu Asano

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc: A journalist leaves behind her sheltered life in New York to report from the front line in Afghanistan. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Tina Fey and Margot Robbie

programme.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
programme.desc: A lawyer risks the wrath of his neighbours in a racially divided backwater in Alabama by agreeing to defend a black man on a rape charge. As he struggles to shield his son and daughter from the case's disturbing undertones, the children also have to confront their fear of a local recluse. Oscar-winning, Depression-era drama based on the classic novel by Harper Lee, starring Gregory Peck, Robert Duvall, Mary Badham and Phillip Alford

programme.title: Battle for Sevastopol
programme.desc: A female Russian student becomes an expert sniper during the Second World War, regarded as a hero by her own people and a deadly threat by the German high command. In the later years of the war, she travels to the US, befriending Eleanor Roosevelt and spearheading a campaign to persuade America to join the Allies. Fact-based drama, starring Yuliya Peresild and Evgeniy Tsyganov. In Russian and English

programme.title: Lemon
programme.desc: A calamity-stricken actor's career and personal life starts crumbling around him. Comedy drama, starring Brett Gelman, Judy Greer and Michael Cera

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: American officer Aldo Raine leads a squad of soldiers into occupied France on a mission to kill as many Nazis as possible and spread fear through the Third Reich. They become involved in a Jewish resistance fighter's plan to blow up the premiere of a propaganda movie - due to be attended by Hitler himself. Quentin Tarantino's wartime adventure, with Brad Pitt, Melanie Laurent, Diane Kruger, Michael Fassbender and an Oscar-winning Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A college undergraduate training for a marathon is drawn into a shady world of espionage by his secret agent brother and a Nazi war criminal searching for a cache of stolen diamonds - entangling the student in a plot involving kidnap, torture and political intrigue. John Schlesinger's thriller, starring Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. Based on the novel by William Goldman(n)

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A youngster growing up in a town inhabited only by boys and women makes a strange discovery in the ocean that leaves him convinced that secrets are being kept from him. When he is taken to hospital for a series of procedures, he discovers the terrible truth about his home. Sci-fi mystery, starring Max Brebant and Roxane Duran. In French(n)

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai(n)

programme.title: Ma Ma
programme.desc: A single mum finds meaning in new friendships as her treatment for breast cancer intensifies. Spanish drama, starring Penelope Cruz(n)

programme.title: Goat
programme.desc: New college student Brad is desperate to fit into his new surroundings, so taking a cue from his older brother, he decides to pledge a fraternity. All goes well at first as he attends parties and meets several girls, but as he enters into the final stretch of the pledging ritual-known as hell week, Brad finds things taking a violent turn as he has to endure a series of brutal initiation rituals. Fact-based drama, with Ben Schnetzer and Nick Jonas(n)

programme.title: The Confirmation
programme.desc: When his tools are stolen, a divorced, down-on-his-luck handyman and his young son attempt to track down the culprits. Comedy, starring Clive Owen, Jaeden Lieberher and Maria Bello(n)

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson(n)

programme.title: Hello, Dolly
programme.desc: A widowed matchmaker sets about finding a new wife for a grain merchant whose spouse has died. However, she has secretly fallen in love with the man herself, and hatches an elaborate plan to marry him. Musical set in late 19th-century New York, starring Barbra Streisand, Walter Matthau, Michael Crawford and Marianne McAndrew, and featuring Louis Armstrong's performance of the title number(n)

programme.title: The Unknown Girl
programme.desc: After failing to open the door to a woman who later turns up dead, a guilt-stricken young medical doctor turns amateur detective. Belgian-French thriller, starring Adele Haenel, Olivier Bonnaud, Jeremie Renier and Louka Minnella(n)

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss(n)

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation
programme.desc: Biopic of Nat Turner, the literate plantation preacher who led a slave rebellion in 1831 Virginia, starring Nate Parker, Armie Hammer and Penelope Ann Miller(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson(n)

programme.title: The Love Bug
programme.desc: Herbie, an irrepressible Beetle car with a mind of its own, takes a shine to a struggling racing driver and leads him to victory on the track. However, his success attracts the attention of an unscrupulous rival competitor, who will go to any lengths to win the most important race of all. Disney comedy, starring Dean Jones, Michele Lee, Buddy Hackett and David Tomlinson

programme.title: Kronk's New Groove
programme.desc: Inca entrepreneur Kronk is keen to see his restaurant business get off to a good start, especially with his father about to visit. However, the catering industry proves to be more challenging than he ever expected. Animated sequel to Disney's comedy The Emperor's New Groove, with the voices of David Spade, Tracey Ullman, Patrick Warburton, Eartha Kitt and John Goodman

programme.title: Mickey, Donald, Goofy: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: Three cleaners dream of becoming musketeers - and unexpectedly get the chance to make their wish come true when they are made bodyguards to a princess. However, they do not realise the captain of the guard is plotting to kill her and has given them the job because he thinks they will fail. Animated adventure, with the voices of Wayne Allwine, Tony Anselmo, Bill Farmer and Russi Taylor

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: The son of Zeus, king of the Greek gods, is sent to Earth to be raised as a human. When he learns of his immortal heritage, he discovers he can only reclaim his position among the gods by becoming a true hero, so he embarks on a series of adventures and battles fearsome monsters to prove his worth. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Tate Donovan, Danny DeVito, James Woods and Rip Torn

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt

programme.title: The Aristocats
programme.desc: A jealous butler is outraged when his employer leaves a vast fortune to her cat and kittens instead of to him, so he drives the pets to the French countryside and dumps them. However, a streetwise alley cat steps in to help the pampered felines find their way home and claim their rightful inheritance. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Eva Gabor, Phil Harris and Scatman Crothers

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: A video game villain grows tired of always being the bad guy, and ventures into other games in search of the chance to be a hero, unwittingly causing chaos in the process. When a deadly threat to the entire arcade appears, it falls to him to set things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of John C Reilly, Sarah Silverman and Jane Lynch

programme.title: Winnie the Pooh: Springtime with Roo
programme.desc: The gang's Easter celebrations come under threat when Rabbit grumpily refuses to join in, preferring to spend the day spring cleaning. Roo comes up with a plan to cheer him up and remind him that he used to love the holiday. Animated adventure, narrated by David Ogden Stiers and featuring the voices of Jim Cummings, Ken Sansom and Jimmy Bennett

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: A group of lemurs finds a dinosaur egg, and when it hatches, brings the baby lizard up. When a meteor strike destroys their territory, the reptile and his mammal family must go in search of a new home, a quest that leads to dangerous encounters with other creatures. Animated adventure, with the voices of DB Sweeney, Julianna Margulies and Joan Plowright

programme.title: Olaf's Frozen Adventure
programme.desc: Premiere. Olaf the snowman is on the hunt for the perfect Christmas tradition. Animated short spun-off from Frozen, with the voices of Josh Gad, Kristen Bell and Jonathan Groff

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: A video game villain grows tired of always being the bad guy, and ventures into other games in search of the chance to be a hero, unwittingly causing chaos in the process. When a deadly threat to the entire arcade appears, it falls to him to set things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of John C Reilly, Sarah Silverman and Jane Lynch

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: A battle-hardened military veteran fails to protect a government scientist from assassins. He is assigned to safeguard the dead boffin's family in case the killers come after the top-secret technology in his home, but finds looking after kids proves far tougher than taking on hitmen. Family comedy, starring Vin Diesel and Lauren Graham

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill

programme.title: The Story of Robin Hood and His Merrie Men
programme.desc: A noble archer attends a royal contest, but on the way home his father is murdered by henchmen of the wicked King John. He assumes the life of an outlaw, gathering a band of followers in Sherwood Forest and fighting to bring justice to the over-taxed poor and avenge his father's death. Adventure, starring Richard Todd, Joan Rice and Peter Finch

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A foul-tempered Victorian miser who hates the festive season is visited on Christmas Eve by a series of ghosts. The spirits intend to make him mend his wicked ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future will hold for him if he does not change for the better. Animated fantasy based on Charles Dickens' novel, featuring motion-captured performances by Jim Carrey and Gary Oldman

programme.title: Winnie the Pooh: Springtime with Roo
programme.desc: The gang's Easter celebrations come under threat when Rabbit grumpily refuses to join in, preferring to spend the day spring cleaning. Roo comes up with a plan to cheer him up and remind him that he used to love the holiday. Animated adventure, narrated by David Ogden Stiers and featuring the voices of Jim Cummings, Ken Sansom and Jimmy Bennett

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Secret of the Wings
programme.desc: The fairy becomes curious about the mysterious winter forest where fairies never dare to go. She travels into the cold woods, where she meets a new friend and uncovers a threat to both their homes that they must work together to prevent. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Lucy Hale, Anjelica Huston and Timothy Dalton

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the frog is persuaded by his agent that he has a future in movies. He sets off on a journey across America to realise his dream, gathering a crowd of like-minded friends along the way - but the owner of a French restaurant plans to make him the dish of the day. Comedy, starring Dom DeLuise and Charles Durning alongside the puppet characters, with cameos from Mel Brooks, Orson Welles and Steve Martin

programme.title: Disney's Blank Cheque
programme.desc: Convicted bank-robber Carl Quigley plots to exchange $1,000,000 in stolen bills by coercing a bank's president into swapping the notes for legal tender. As he tries to escape the scene of his plot, Quigley runs over 11-year-old Preston Waters' bicycle, and in his haste to get away, offers the boy a blank cheque as compensation. However, Quigley fails to anticipate tech-savvy Preston exploiting the gesture to help himself to the criminal's million-dollar fortune, then embarking a dream spending spree. Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Nemo and dad Marlin set out on an underwater adventure to help their forgetful friend Dory find her parents. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks and Ed O'Neill

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright

programme.title: The Sword in the Stone
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure about King Arthur's first childhood encounter with the absent-minded magician Merlin in a forest. The kindly wizard takes the youngster under his wing and teaches him the ways of the world - leading to an incident with a crazed witch and the event that will change the future king's life for ever. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: An embittered Victorian miser hates the festive season and people in general, but on Christmas Eve, the ghosts of his former business partners, the Marley brothers, visit him in the night. They warn him three spirits are coming to make him change his ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future may hold. Comedy, with Michael Caine and Steven Mackintosh alongside the puppet characters(n)

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges(n)

programme.title: Prom
programme.desc: High-school students eagerly look forward to their graduation party, but have personal and romantic issues to deal with along the way. The class president is determined everything needs to be perfect and is frustrated by a fellow student's interference - only to have a change of heart and realise he may be her perfect date. Comedy drama, with Aimee Teegarden and Thomas McDonell(n)

programme.title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
programme.desc: A couple bury a box containing their wishes for the perfect child they are unable to have. Soon afterwards, a mysterious boy with leaves growing from his feet shows up on their doorstep, claiming to be their son. The strange youngster soon transforms the lives of not only his parents, but their whole community. Fantasy, starring Jennifer Garner and Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams(n)

To try to re-establish their reputations, the duo and Gonzo fly to London to see if they can track down the culprit. Comedy, with the voices of Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with cameo appearances by John Cleese, Diana Rigg, Charles Grodin and Peter Ustinov(n)

programme.desc: Anthology of animated tales based on AA Milne's stories, following a series of exploits of the dim-witted bear and his collection of unusual friends. With the voices of Sterling Holloway, Paul Winchell, Sebastian Cabot and Junius Matthews(n)

He makes a fresh start in a seaside town, befriending a lighthouse keeper and her father, but the Gogans are soon on his trail, while a phoney doctor wants the dragon for his travelling show. Part-animated musical fantasy, starring Jim Dale, Sean Marshall, Helen Reddy, Mickey Rooney and Shelley Winters(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A teenager from Boston moves to a small conservative town, and discovers the council and a preacher have enforced a ban on loud music and dancing. He openly defies the harsh rules, revitalising the local youth and winning the heart of the reverend's daughter. Musical remake, with Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough and Dennis Quaid

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: The Easter bunny's son is about to take over the chocolate-delivering business, but rejects his responsibilities and heads for Hollywood to seek fame and fortune as a drummer. He makes life difficult for the directionless slacker who takes him in, but they must work together to avert a crisis on Easter island. Part-animated comedy, starring James Marsden, with the voice of Russell Brand

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement

programme.title: Zootropolis: Special

Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry

programme.desc: Chaos erupts when a cowardly critter uses an untested scientific contraption and accidentally swaps bodies with a caterpillar. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Vinnie Penna, Peter Linz, Mike Pollock and Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan

programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend.
